plot: Small business owner and artist, Jeff McKenzie, reflects on the growingly automated world around him while trying to reconnect with his passion for the art behind his trade.
title: McKenzie
plot_es: Small business owner and artist, Jeff McKenzie, reflects on the growingly automated world around him while trying to reconnect with his passion for the art behind his trade.
plot_en: Small business owner and artist, Jeff McKenzie, reflects on the growingly automated world around him while trying to reconnect with his passion for the art behind his trade.
